name: Cash Rush (itch)
description:
Cash Rush is a Clicker / Shop Simulator.

Start humble and work your way up, then show the world how much of a boss you are by making BILLIONS! (By the way... It's fake money soz)

● Buy a varied range of stock to sell for profit

● Increase your popularity by selling stock

● Use your profit to add decorations to your store

● Increase your margin to make higher profits

● Buy employees to increase your workflow
